situation: A hollow cast iron pole has an outside diameter of 450-mm and an inside diameter of 350-mm. It is subjected to a compressive force of 1200kN. The length of the column is 1.2m, and it is braced against buckling and bending. Let E =100 GPa.

subquestions.question: What is the resulting stress due to the compressive force?
What is the total contraction (mm) of the member due to the compressive force?
Determine the load in kN that will cause a strain of 0.0003mm/mm.
